text: Di Giovanni is a surname. Notable people with the surname include: * Bartolomeo di Giovanni (died 1501), early Renaissance Italian painter * Benvenuto di Giovanni (c. 1436–1509/1518), Italian painter and artist * Bertoldo di Giovanni (after 1420–1491), Italian sculptor and medallist * Matteo di Giovanni (c. 1430–1495), Italian Renaissance artist
title: Di Giovanni
